text: Apple replaces the "Plus" iPhone with an all new model...
full-pick-text: Apple replaces the "Plus" iPhone with an all new model. It's the thinnest iPhone ever, but is made of titanium to remain strong. It has no Camera Control and/or Action Button. It does not offer an always-on display.
notes:
• "It's the thinnest iPhone ever, but is made of titanium to remain strong."
  • "It has no Camera Control and/or Action Button."
  • "It does not offer an always-on display."
